column4: How can I use my computer to login to another cmoputer and see everything like using two computers with one monitor?
viewing a remote windows box from linux with vnc is usually ok, but i've always had problems trying to view another linux box via vnc
When I use vncviewer and enter the remote password, I get a screen with lines on it and a cross cursor. Is this normal? What am I missing?
that sounds like an x session with no window manager running
I didn't specify a desktop on the remote machine, it jsut picked one. How do I know what one to use?
I don't understand. What's this desktop perameter?
what are you logging in to?  a linux box?
and is it running x right now and a window manager?  kde or gnome or something?
i don't know, i'm not a vnc expert.  sounds like you were able to connect.  i don't know why you don't see the gnome session
When I try something it says "already running as :# I should probably logout and try that number.
I had to stop gdm. It worked by looked pretty bad. Was an interesting experience. Thank you.
you might need to specify the resolution
